silver.information: At Daniel Wellington, we let the design speak for itself. We strive for perfection and believe in the beauty of simplicity. The Elan Dual Ring is inspired by the delicate silhouette of our Classic Ring, with an elevated twist. The result is a harmonious and striking balance of minimalism and edge. With our logo subtly engraved on the inside of the ring, the Elan Dual Ring is a symbol of our dedication to meticulous craftsmanship.
